summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Plat 36E, Page 103 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property at 425 Broadway East from Midrise - Residential/Commercial (MR/RC) to Neighborhood Commercial 3 with a 65 foot height limit (NC3 65') and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Cardwell/Thomas; C.F. 29454).
